commit.message:
re PR c++/70512 (ICE on valid code on x86_64-linux-gnu: canonical types differ for identical types)

	PR c++/70512
	* class.c (fixup_may_alias): New.
	(fixup_attribute_variants): Call it.

	* g++.dg/ext/attribute-may-alias-5.C: New.

From-SVN: r234768
